meanings.definition: The act of measuring or determining the dimensions of something.
meanings.sent1: During the dimensioning of the room, we found it was ten feet wide.
meanings.sent2: Architects use dimensioning to ensure buildings are accurately sized.
meanings.sent3: The dimensioning of the cake layers resulted in a perfectly even dessert.
meanings.sent4: She approached life with the precision of dimensioning a blueprint.
meanings.sent5: The dimensioning of the map made it easy to navigate the city streets.

meanings.definition: The process of adding dimensions to a drawing or design.
meanings.sent1: In art class, we learned about dimensioning to make our drawings more realistic.
meanings.sent2: The dimensioning of the floor plan helped visualize the final construction.
meanings.sent3: The dimensioning of the cartoon character gave it a more lifelike appearance.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity shone through in the dimensioning of the mural on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The dimensioning of the logo added depth and perspective to the brand.

meanings.definition: The act of specifying the dimensions of an object or space.
meanings.sent1: Precision is crucial in dimensioning to avoid errors in construction.
meanings.sent2: The dimensioning of the furniture layout ensured a perfect fit in the room.
meanings.sent3: His exaggerated dimensioning of the story made it more entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The dimensioning of the garden transformed it into a beautiful outdoor space.
meanings.sent5: The dimensioning of the costume highlighted the attention to detail in the design.
